com.st.st25sdk.type4a

Class FileControlTlvType4

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.st25sdk.type4a.FileControlTlvType4

  • public class FileControlTlvType4
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines all required methods to handle a NFC Forum Type4 CCfile TLV block

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static byte LOCKED_BY_PASSWORD
      File access condition: access allowed after presenting the required password
      static byte PERMANENTLY_LOCKED
      File access condition: no access allowed

    • Constructor Summary
